message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 4-2-1, translated into en
data:
- Number of children under 5 years of age who are appropriately developed in terms of health, learning and psychosocial: Departments of Education and Training of provinces/cities under central authority collect information from the form: 01- MN-DN

- Total number of children under 5 years old in the population: Collected through censuses of the General Statistics Office

- The Ministry of Education and Training compiles data on the number of children under 5 years of age who are appropriately developed in terms of health, learning and psychosocial and the number of children under 5 years old in the population from the General Statistics Office to calculate this indicator.
